sentence__0: The selected birds have very short and cone shaped bills.
sentence__1: If the bird is medium sized, it probably is a selected bird.
sentence__2: The selected birds often have a tree clinging type body shape.
sentence__3: Most if not all of the selected birds have a solid tail pattern.
sentence__4: Many of the selected birds have a white top belly and orange tinged lower belly.
sentence__5: If the bird is black or gray, it likely is a selected bird.
sentence__6: Many of the selected birds have grey crowns, darker than their bodies.
sentence__7: If the bird has a solid wing color it is probably a selected bird.
